content: @ranig @WR4NYGov @BeyondMeat Speaking strictly for myself and my family, we used to think In-and-Out was the best, but now it's the Impossible Whopper and we have Beyond Meat in the freezer. I cannot distinguish between the two. We're omnivores, BTW, and eat what we like.

If we're going to discuss a "sin tax" we better start with ultra-processed man-made crap like @BeyondMeat @ImpossibleFoods @Hostess_Snacks @Fritolay @CocaCola @Unilever etc. Demonizing REAL food is only about money, NOT #healthandwellness. #eatrealfood #activeeveryday https://t.co/OkUslzwgeW
